sentences.en: Bent double, like old beggars under sacks Knock-kneed, coughing like hags, we cursed through sludge Till on the haunting flares we turned our backs And towards our distant rest began to trudge.
sentences.cn: 深深地弯下腰，就像压在麻包下的老乞丐,双膝跪下，象丑陋的老太婆在咳嗽，我们用泥巴诅咒,直到闪耀的火光浮现，我们才背转身,向着我们遥远的憩息处开始跋涉。

sentences.en: He trudge three hour in the snow to get back home.
sentences.cn: 他在雪中跋涉三个钟点才回到家。

sentences.en: I shall trudge on along the path till I attain that blessed state.
sentences.cn: 我会沿途跋涉,直到达到那种受祝福的状态.

sentences.en: It was a hard trudge up the hill.
sentences.cn: 这趟上山是一次艰难的跋涉.

sentences.en: It was a long trudge up the hill.
It was a trudge up the hill.
sentences.cn: 这“趟”上山是一次艰难的跋涉.

sentences.en: My great grandpa would tell it to trudge on, but it wouldn't budge.
sentences.cn: 太姥爷想赶它继续走, 但是那匹马一动也不动.

sentences.en: Progress was slow as they had to trudge through deep mud.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不在很深在泥沼中艰难跋涉,所以进展很慢.

sentences.en: So, for a variety of reasons, a lot of people trudge through a job they simply cannot stand.
sentences.cn: 因此，由于种种原因，许多人在他们简直无法承担的工作中辛苦跋涉。

sentences.en: The trudge through the forest will be tiresome.
sentences.cn: 长途跋涉穿越森林会令人疲惫不堪.

sentences.en: They will trudge along, facing a growing set of roadblocks, until, exhausted, they collapse.
sentences.cn: 他们会一路跋涉，遭遇路上不断出现的一系列障碍，直到筋疲力尽，倒在路上。

sentences.en: They've set off for the long trudge home.
sentences.cn: 他们出发了,长途步行回家.

sentences.en: Through trudge, he comes to bazaar with the elder brother eventually.
sentences.cn: 经过长途跋涉，他终于和哥哥来到市集。

sentences.en: To compromise would have been more harrowing than and jungles we had to trudge trudge through.
sentences.cn: 在这点上妥协将比那些我们要跋涉的深山密林更教人痛苦.

sentences.en: To march or trudge through or as if through mud.
sentences.cn: 在泥污中费力行进在或似乎在泥泞中前进或跋涉.

sentences.en: We had to trudge up the track back to the station.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不沿路艰难地走回车站。

sentences.en: We trudged home through the snow.
sentences.cn: 我们艰难地穿过雪地走回了家。

sentences.en: We were reluctant to start the long trudge home.
sentences.cn: 我们很不愿意踏上如此漫长艰辛的回家之路。

sentences.en: What we're engaged in is radically individual: a single - file trudge through treacherous terrain.
sentences.cn: 我们从事的是绝对个人的事: 成单行穿行暗藏危险的地形.

trans.tran_cn: 跋涉，长途疲劳的步行，沉重的脚步，沉重疲累地走着的人

trans.tran_en: to walk with slow heavy steps, especially because you are tired or it is difficult to walk
